name: anypage-reader
description: A customized Chrome extension that reads aloud webpage content with enhanced UI. Fork of Read Aloud with modern design improvements.

scripts.package: zip -r build/package.zip _locales css img js sound *.html manifest.json background.js -x \*.map || true

note: This is a customized fork of the original Read Aloud extension with enhanced UI/UX and rebranding to anypage reader.
